original_text:
He will deliver even one who is not innocent,
    who will be delivered through the cleanness of your hands.”
korean_text: 죄 없는 자가 아니라도 건지시리니 네 손이 깨끗함으로 말미암아 건지심을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: He will deliver even one who is not innocent
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 죄가 없지 않은 자라도 구원할 것이며

sentences.original_text: through the cleanness of your hands
